issue.title: Mass properties for the Atlas Unplugged v4 SDF are way off

content.raw: @hsu @scpeters @BillBlank Wanted to follow up on this re: the v5 model.  I see where the masses were updated in the pull request, but the total mass of the generated .sdf is around 155kg, which seems low. I know that the forearms come with a weight reduction but ~10 kg per arm seems quite a bit for just the forearms. Is this correct?
